docs.snippet: All Times EDTFriday, July 11AUTO RACING11:30 a.m....
New York Yankees rookie ace Masahiro Tanaka, who leads Major League Baseball in wins, has been put on the disabled list with tightness in his pitching elbow, the team said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York Yankees rookie ace Masahiro Tanaka, who leads Major League Baseball in wins, has been put on the disabled list with tightness in his pitching elbow, the team said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Yankees' Tanaka to Have MRI on Pitching Arm
headline.print_headline: Yankees' Tanaka to Have MRI on Pitching Arm

docs.snippet: Marisol Hernandez recently gave her daughter a new iPhone 5S on condition she get good grades during her sophomore year of high school. Rubi Rubio already had broken two phones, so Hernandez told her daughter if she broke this one it would be her ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Marisol Hernandez recently gave her daughter a new iPhone 5S on condition she get good grades during her sophomore year of high school. Rubi Rubio already had broken two phones, so Hernandez told her daughter if she broke this one it would be her last.

headline.main: Teen Dies After Jumping on iPhone Thief's Car

docs.snippet: The acquittal of Rengan Rajaratnam in his criminal insider trading case sets the stage for the S.E.C.’s civil case against him, Peter J. Henning writes in the White Collar Watch column....
